name: DishwasherSounds
0:
”Alexa open Dishwasher Sounds”
”Alexa ask Dishwasher Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dishwasher sounds
des:
Immerse yourself in the calming ambiance of kitchen serenity with Dishwasher Sounds, the perfect Alexa Skill for relaxation and focus. Whether you're missing the comforting hum of a dishwasher in the background or seeking a unique white noise to drown out distractions, this skill brings the distinctive sound of a running dishwasher right into your home or office.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Dishwasher Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
